searchSql.baseSql: with tb as(select CASE_CODE ,CASE_LOAN_REQ ,CASE_CON_PRICE ,MORT_TYPE ,MORT_COM_AMOUNT ,MORT_PRF_AMOUNT ,CASE_ORG_ID_F--组别ID ,CASE_DISTRICT_ID--贵宾服务部ID from sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO tb1 where 1=1 <ifNotNull districtId> and CASE_DISTRICT_ID=#districtId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull teamId> and CASE_ORG_ID_F=#teamId# </ifNotNull> and tb1.BELONG_MONTH=#belongMonth# and TRANSFER_ISPASS=1 and convert(varchar(7),TRANSFER_APP_TIME,120)=#choiceMonth#), tb2 as ( select '30016001' as 'MORT_TYPE' union all select '30016003' as 'MORT_TYPE' union all select '30016002' as 'MORT_TYPE' union all select 'NO_LOAN_REQ' as 'MORT_TYPE' union all select 'TOTAL' as 'TOTAL' ) select tb2.MORT_TYPE as MORT_TYPE, CASE WHEN tb2.MORT_TYPE='TOTAL' THEN 5 WHEN tb2.MORT_TYPE='30016001' THEN 3 WHEN tb2.MORT_TYPE='30016003' THEN 2 WHEN tb2.MORT_TYPE='30016002' THEN 4 WHEN tb2.MORT_TYPE='NO_LOAN_REQ' THEN 1 END AS ORDER_NO, CASE WHEN tb2.MORT_TYPE='TOTAL' THEN '合计' WHEN tb2.MORT_TYPE='30016001' THEN '纯商' WHEN tb2.MORT_TYPE='30016003' THEN '纯公积金' WHEN tb2.MORT_TYPE='30016002' THEN '组合' WHEN tb2.MORT_TYPE='NO_LOAN_REQ' THEN '无贷款' END AS MORT_TYPE_CN ,isnull(l1.CASE_COUNT,0) as CASE_COUNT ,isnull(l1.CASE_CON_PRICE,0) as CASE_CON_PRICE ,isnull(l1.MORT_COM_AMOUNT,0) as MORT_COM_AMOUNT ,isnull(l1.MORT_PRF_AMOUNT,0) as MORT_PRF_AMOUNT from tb2 left join ( select CASE WHEN GROUPING(tn.MORT_TYPE) =1 THEN 'TOTAL' ELSE MORT_TYPE END AS MORT_TYPE, count(tn.MORT_TYPE) CASE_COUNT, isnull(sum(tn.CASE_CON_PRICE),0) CASE_CON_PRICE, isnull(sum(tn.MORT_COM_AMOUNT),0) MORT_COM_AMOUNT, isnull(sum(tn.MORT_PRF_AMOUNT),0) MORT_PRF_AMOUNT from ( select tb.MORT_TYPE as MORT_TYPE, CASE_CON_PRICE as CASE_CON_PRICE, MORT_COM_AMOUNT as MORT_COM_AMOUNT, MORT_PRF_AMOUNT as MORT_PRF_AMOUNT from tb where CASE_LOAN_REQ = 1 and (MORT_TYPE is not null and MORT_TYPE<>'') union all select 'NO_LOAN_REQ' as MORT_TYPE, CASE_CON_PRICE as CASE_CON_PRICE, 0 MORT_COM_AMOUNT, 0 MORT_PRF_AMOUNT from tb where CASE_LOAN_REQ = 0 ) as tn group by tn.MORT_TYPE WITH ROLLUP ) as l1 on tb2.MORT_TYPE=l1.MORT_TYPE order by ORDER_NO

with tb as(select CASE_CODE ,CASE_LOAN_REQ ,CASE_CON_PRICE ,MORT_TYPE ,MORT_COM_AMOUNT ,MORT_PRF_AMOUNT ,CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F--案件主办userID ,CASE_REAL_NAME_F--案件主办姓名 ,CASE_ORG_ID_F--组别ID ,CASE_ORG_NAME_F--组别名称 ,CASE_DISTRICT_ID--贵宾服务部ID ,CASE_DISTRICT_NAME--贵宾服务部名称 ,CASE_REC_STATUS--是否流失 ,LOAN_LOST_AMOUNT--流失金额 ,EVA_EVAL_FEE--案件评估费 ,EVA_RECORD_TIME--案件评估费确实时间 ,ELOAN_PRO--案件对应的金融类产品 ,ELOAN_PRO_AMOUNT--金融产品总金额 ,ELOAN_KA--案件对应的卡类产品 ,CASE_USE_CARD_PAY_CN--案件是否刷卡 ,CASE_CARD_PAY_AMOUNT--刷卡金额1 from sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO tb1 where 1=1 and tb1.BELONG_MONTH=#belongMonth# and TRANSFER_ISPASS=1 <if test="produceType == 'team'"> and tb1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=#teamId# --(按照组别) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and tb1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=#districtId# --(按照贵宾服务部) </if> and convert(varchar(7),TRANSFER_APP_TIME,120)=#choiceMonth#), <if test="produceType == ''"> tb2 as (select DISTRICT_ID,DISTRICT_NAME from sctrans.v_yucui_org_hierarchy where DEP_HIERARCHY='yucui_district' and director is not null GROUP BY DISTRICT_ID,DISTRICT_NAME) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> tb2 as (select ORG_ID,TEAM_NAME from sctrans.v_yucui_org_hierarchy where DEP_HIERARCHY='yucui_team' and DISTRICT_ID=#districtId#) </if> <if test="produceType == 'team'"> tb2 as (select USER_ID,REAL_NAME from sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB where JOB_CODE='consultant' and ORG_ID=#teamId#) </if> select isnull(l2.CASE_COUNT,0) as CASE_COUNT <if test="produceType == ''"> ,tb2.DISTRICT_NAME as CASE_PART </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> ,tb2.TEAM_NAME as CASE_PART </if> <if test="produceType == 'team'"> ,tb2.REAL_NAME as CASE_PART </if> ,isnull(l2.MORT_COM_COUNT,0) as MORT_COM_COUNT ,isnull(l2.MORT_COM_AMOUNT,0) as MORT_COM_AMOUNT ,isnull(l2.CASE_CON_PRICE,0) as CASE_CON_PRICE ,isnull(l2.LOST_COUNT,0) as LOST_COUNT ,isnull(l2.LOST_AMOUNT,0) as LOST_AMOUNT ,isnull(l2.EVA_COUNT,0) as EVA_COUNT ,isnull(l2.EVA_FEE,0) as EVA_FEE ,isnull(l2.E_CARD_COUNT,0) as E_CARD_COUNT ,isnull(l2.CARD_COUNT,0) as CARD_COUNT ,isnull(l2.E_AMOUNT,0) as E_AMOUNT from tb2 left join ( select count(1) as CASE_COUNT, (select count(1) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.CASE_LOAN_REQ=1 and (t1.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or t1.MORT_TYPE='30016002') <if test="produceType == 'team'"> and t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F --(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F --(按照组别) </if>
<if test="produceType == ''"> and t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID --(按照贵宾服务部) </if> ) as MORT_COM_COUNT, isnull((select sum(MORT_COM_AMOUNT) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.CASE_LOAN_REQ=1 and (t1.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or t1.MORT_TYPE='30016002') <if test="produceType == 'team'"> and t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F --(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F --(按照组别) </if>
<if test="produceType == ''"> and t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID --(按照贵宾服务部) </if> ),0) as MORT_COM_AMOUNT, isnull((select sum(t1.CASE_CON_PRICE) from tb as t1 where 1=1 <if test="produceType == 'team'"> and t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F --(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F --(按照组别) </if>
<if test="produceType == ''"> and t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID --(按照贵宾服务部) </if> ),0) as CASE_CON_PRICE, (select count(1) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.CASE_LOAN_REQ=1 and t1.CASE_REC_STATUS='1' <if test="produceType == 'team'"> and t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F --(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F --(按照组别) </if>
<if test="produceType == ''"> and t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID --(按照贵宾服务部) </if> ) as LOST_COUNT, isnull((select sum(LOAN_LOST_AMOUNT) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.CASE_LOAN_REQ=1 <if test="produceType == 'team'"> and t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F --(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F --(按照组别) </if>
<if test="produceType == ''"> and t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID --(按照贵宾服务部) </if> ),0) as LOST_AMOUNT, (select count(1) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.EVA_EVAL_FEE is not null <if test="produceType == 'team'"> and t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F --(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F --(按照组别) </if>
<if test="produceType == ''"> and t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID --(按照贵宾服务部) </if> ) as EVA_COUNT, isnull((select sum(EVA_EVAL_FEE) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.EVA_EVAL_FEE is not null <if test="produceType == 'team'"> and t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F --(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F --(按照组别) </if>
<if test="produceType == ''"> and t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID --(按照贵宾服务部) </if> ),0) as EVA_FEE, (select count(1) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.ELOAN_KA is not null <if test="produceType == 'team'"> and t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F --(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F --(按照组别) </if>
<if test="produceType == ''"> and t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID --(按照贵宾服务部) </if> ) as E_CARD_COUNT, (select count(1) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.CASE_USE_CARD_PAY_CN='1' <if test="produceType == 'team'"> and t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F --(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F --(按照组别) </if>
<if test="produceType == ''"> and t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID --(按照贵宾服务部) </if> ) as CARD_COUNT, isnull((select sum(ELOAN_PRO_AMOUNT) from tb as t1 where 1=1 <if test="produceType == 'team'"> and t1.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F=t.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F --(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> and t1.CASE_ORG_ID_F=t.CASE_ORG_ID_F --(按照组别) </if>
<if test="produceType == ''"> and t1.CASE_DISTRICT_ID=t.CASE_DISTRICT_ID --(按照贵宾服务部) </if> ),0) as E_AMOUNT, <if test="produceType == 'team'"> CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F--(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> CASE_ORG_ID_F--(按照组别) </if> <if test="produceType == ''"> CASE_DISTRICT_ID--(按照贵宾服务部) </if>
from tb as t <if test="produceType == 'team'"> group by CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F--(按照交易顾问) </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> group by CASE_ORG_ID_F </if> <if test="produceType == ''"> group by CASE_DISTRICT_ID </if> ) l2 on <if test="produceType == 'team'"> tb2.USER_ID=l2.CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F </if> <if test="produceType == 'district'"> tb2.ORG_ID=l2.CASE_ORG_ID_F </if> <if test="produceType == ''"> tb2.DISTRICT_ID=l2.CASE_DISTRICT_ID </if>
order by l2.CASE_COUNT desc

with tb as(select CASE_CODE ,CASE_LOAN_REQ ,CASE_CON_PRICE ,MORT_TYPE ,MORT_COM_AMOUNT ,MORT_PRF_AMOUNT ,CASE_LEADING_PROCESS_ID_F--案件主办userID ,CASE_REAL_NAME_F--案件主办姓名 ,CASE_ORG_ID_F--组别ID ,CASE_ORG_NAME_F--组别名称 ,CASE_DISTRICT_ID--贵宾服务部ID ,CASE_DISTRICT_NAME--贵宾服务部名称 ,CASE_REC_STATUS--是否流失 ,IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI--是否是中原办理 ,LOAN_LOST_AMOUNT--流失金额 ,EVA_EVAL_FEE--案件评估费 ,EVA_RECORD_TIME--案件评估费确实时间 ,ELOAN_PRO--案件对应的金融类产品 ,ELOAN_PRO_AMOUNT--金融产品总金额 ,ELOAN_KA--案件对应的卡类产品 ,CASE_USE_CARD_PAY_CN--案件是否刷卡 ,CASE_CARD_PAY_AMOUNT--刷卡金额 ,[JQYDS_NAME]--区域董事姓名 ,[JQYDS_EMPLOYEE_CODE]--区域董事雇员编号 ,[JQYZJ_NAME]--区域总监姓名 ,[JQYZJ_CODE]--区域总监雇员编号 ,[JQYJL_NAME]--区域经理姓名 ,[JQYJL_EMPLOYEE_CODE]--区域经理雇员编号 ,[JFHJL_NAME]--分行经理姓名 ,[JFHJL_EMPLOYEE_CODE]--分行经理雇员编号 ,[GROUP_ORG_ID] ,[BUSIAR_ORG_ID] ,[BUSISWZ_ORG_ID] ,[BUSIWZ_ORG_ID] ,[BUSISH_ORG_ID] from sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO tb1 where 1=1 and tb1.BELONG_MONTH=#belongMonth# and TRANSFER_ISPASS=1 and convert(varchar(7),TRANSFER_APP_TIME,120)=#choiceMonth#), os as( select p.id,p.parent_id from sctrans.sys_org p where 1=1 <if test="produceType == 'JQYDS'"> and p.id='1D29BB468F504774ACE653B946A393EE' </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYZJ'"> <ifNotNull condition_qudongId> and p.id=#condition_qudongId# </ifNotNull> </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYJL'"> <ifNotNull condition_directorId> and p.id=#condition_directorId# </ifNotNull> </if> <if test="produceType == 'JFHJL'"> <ifNotNull condition_directorId> and p.id=#condition_qyManagerId# </ifNotNull> </if> and p.is_deleted=0 union all select c.id,c.parent_id from os inner join sctrans.sys_org c on c.parent_id = os.id and c.is_deleted=0 ), o as( SELECT uoj.user_id,uoj.org_id, org.org_name,uoj.job_code,uoj.job_name,uoj.real_name FROM sctrans.v_user_org_job uoj INNER join sctrans.sys_org org on uoj.org_id=org.id where ismain=1 and is_leader=1 <if test="produceType == 'JQYDS'"> and uoj.job_code ='JQYDS' </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYZJ'"> and uoj.job_code ='JQYZJ' </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYJL'"> and uoj.job_code ='JQYJL' </if> <if test="produceType == 'JFHJL'"> and uoj.job_code ='JFHJL' </if> and exists(select 1 from os where uoj.org_id = os.id) ) select l1.ORG_ID as ORGANIZATION_ID ,l1.REAL_NAME ,l1.JOB_CODE ,isnull(l2.CASE_COUNT,0) as CASE_COUNT ,isnull(l2.CASE_CON_PRICE,0) as CASE_CON_PRICE ,isnull(l2.MORT_COM_COUNT,0) as MORT_COM_COUNT ,isnull(l2.MORT_COM_AMOUNT,0) as MORT_COM_AMOUNT ,isnull(l2.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI_COUNT,0) as IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI_COUNT ,isnull(l2.IS_DELEGATE_CUSTOMER_COUNT,0) as IS_DELEGATE_CUSTOMER_COUNT ,isnull(l2.LOST_AMOUNT,0) as LOST_AMOUNT ,isnull(l2.EVA_COUNT,0) as EVA_COUNT ,isnull(l2.EVA_FEE,0) as EVA_FEE ,isnull(l2.E_CARD_COUNT,0) as E_CARD_COUNT ,isnull(l2.E_AMOUNT,0) as E_AMOUNT from o l1 left join ( select count(1) as CASE_COUNT, isnull((select sum(t1.CASE_CON_PRICE) from tb as t1 where 1=1 <if test="produceType == 'JQYDS'"> and t1.BUSIWZ_ORG_ID=t.BUSIWZ_ORG_ID--(按照区域董事) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYZJ'"> and t1.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID=t.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID --(按照区域总监) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYJL'"> and t1.BUSIAR_ORG_ID=t.BUSIAR_ORG_ID --(按照区域经理) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JFHJL'"> and t1.GROUP_ORG_ID=t.GROUP_ORG_ID --(按照分行经理) </if> ),0) as CASE_CON_PRICE, (select count(1) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.CASE_LOAN_REQ=1 and (t1.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or t1.MORT_TYPE='30016002') <if test="produceType == 'JQYDS'"> and t1.BUSIWZ_ORG_ID=t.BUSIWZ_ORG_ID--(按照区域董事) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYZJ'"> and t1.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID=t.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID --(按照区域总监) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYJL'"> and t1.BUSIAR_ORG_ID=t.BUSIAR_ORG_ID --(按照区域经理) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JFHJL'"> and t1.GROUP_ORG_ID=t.GROUP_ORG_ID --(按照分行经理) </if> ) as MORT_COM_COUNT, isnull((select sum(MORT_COM_AMOUNT) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.CASE_LOAN_REQ=1 and (t1.MORT_TYPE='30016001' or t1.MORT_TYPE='30016002') <if test="produceType == 'JQYDS'"> and t1.BUSIWZ_ORG_ID=t.BUSIWZ_ORG_ID--(按照区域董事) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYZJ'"> and t1.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID=t.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID --(按照区域总监) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYJL'"> and t1.BUSIAR_ORG_ID=t.BUSIAR_ORG_ID --(按照区域经理) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JFHJL'"> and t1.GROUP_ORG_ID=t.GROUP_ORG_ID --(按照分行经理) </if> ),0) as MORT_COM_AMOUNT, (select count(1) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI='1' <if test="produceType == 'JQYDS'"> and t1.BUSIWZ_ORG_ID=t.BUSIWZ_ORG_ID--(按照区域董事) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYZJ'"> and t1.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID=t.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID --(按照区域总监) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYJL'"> and t1.BUSIAR_ORG_ID=t.BUSIAR_ORG_ID --(按照区域经理) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JFHJL'"> and t1.GROUP_ORG_ID=t.GROUP_ORG_ID --(按照分行经理) </if> ) as IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI_COUNT, (select count(1) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI='0' <if test="produceType == 'JQYDS'"> and t1.BUSIWZ_ORG_ID=t.BUSIWZ_ORG_ID--(按照区域董事) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYZJ'"> and t1.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID=t.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID --(按照区域总监) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYJL'"> and t1.BUSIAR_ORG_ID=t.BUSIAR_ORG_ID --(按照区域经理) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JFHJL'"> and t1.GROUP_ORG_ID=t.GROUP_ORG_ID --(按照分行经理) </if> ) as IS_DELEGATE_CUSTOMER_COUNT, isnull((select sum(LOAN_LOST_AMOUNT) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.CASE_LOAN_REQ=1 <if test="produceType == 'JQYDS'"> and t1.BUSIWZ_ORG_ID=t.BUSIWZ_ORG_ID--(按照区域董事) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYZJ'"> and t1.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID=t.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID --(按照区域总监) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYJL'"> and t1.BUSIAR_ORG_ID=t.BUSIAR_ORG_ID --(按照区域经理) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JFHJL'"> and t1.GROUP_ORG_ID=t.GROUP_ORG_ID --(按照分行经理) </if> ),0) as LOST_AMOUNT, (select count(1) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.EVA_EVAL_FEE is not null <if test="produceType == 'JQYDS'"> and t1.BUSIWZ_ORG_ID=t.BUSIWZ_ORG_ID--(按照区域董事) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYZJ'"> and t1.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID=t.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID --(按照区域总监) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYJL'"> and t1.BUSIAR_ORG_ID=t.BUSIAR_ORG_ID --(按照区域经理) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JFHJL'"> and t1.GROUP_ORG_ID=t.GROUP_ORG_ID --(按照分行经理) </if> ) as EVA_COUNT, isnull((select sum(EVA_EVAL_FEE) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.EVA_EVAL_FEE is not null <if test="produceType == 'JQYDS'"> and t1.BUSIWZ_ORG_ID=t.BUSIWZ_ORG_ID--(按照区域董事) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYZJ'"> and t1.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID=t.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID --(按照区域总监) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYJL'"> and t1.BUSIAR_ORG_ID=t.BUSIAR_ORG_ID --(按照区域经理) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JFHJL'"> and t1.GROUP_ORG_ID=t.GROUP_ORG_ID --(按照分行经理) </if> ),0) as EVA_FEE, (select count(1) from tb as t1 where 1=1 and t1.ELOAN_KA is not null <if test="produceType == 'JQYDS'"> and t1.BUSIWZ_ORG_ID=t.BUSIWZ_ORG_ID--(按照区域董事) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYZJ'"> and t1.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID=t.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID --(按照区域总监) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYJL'"> and t1.BUSIAR_ORG_ID=t.BUSIAR_ORG_ID --(按照区域经理) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JFHJL'"> and t1.GROUP_ORG_ID=t.GROUP_ORG_ID --(按照分行经理) </if> ) as E_CARD_COUNT, isnull((select sum(ELOAN_PRO_AMOUNT) from tb as t1 where 1=1 <if test="produceType == 'JQYDS'"> and t1.BUSIWZ_ORG_ID=t.BUSIWZ_ORG_ID--(按照区域董事) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYZJ'"> and t1.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID=t.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID --(按照区域总监) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYJL'"> and t1.BUSIAR_ORG_ID=t.BUSIAR_ORG_ID --(按照区域经理) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JFHJL'"> and t1.GROUP_ORG_ID=t.GROUP_ORG_ID --(按照分行经理) </if> ),0) as E_AMOUNT,
<if test="produceType == 'JQYDS'"> BUSIWZ_ORG_ID as ORGANIZATION_ID --(按照区域董事) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYZJ'"> BUSISWZ_ORG_ID as ORGANIZATION_ID --(按照区域总监) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYJL'"> BUSIAR_ORG_ID as ORGANIZATION_ID --(按照区域经理) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JFHJL'"> GROUP_ORG_ID as ORGANIZATION_ID --(按照分行经理) </if> from tb as t where <if test="produceType == 'JQYDS'"> BUSIWZ_ORG_ID is not null--(按照区域董事) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYZJ'"> BUSIWZ_ORG_ID is not null--(按照区域总监) <ifNotNull condition_qudongId> and BUSIWZ_ORG_ID=#condition_qudongId# </ifNotNull> </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYJL'"> BUSISWZ_ORG_ID is not null--(按照区域经理) <ifNotNull condition_directorId> and BUSISWZ_ORG_ID=#condition_directorId# </ifNotNull> </if> <if test="produceType == 'JFHJL'"> BUSIAR_ORG_ID is not null--(按照分行经理) <ifNotNull condition_directorId> and BUSIAR_ORG_ID=#condition_qyManagerId# </ifNotNull> </if>
<if test="produceType == 'JQYDS'"> group by BUSIWZ_ORG_ID--(按照区域董事) </if>
<if test="produceType == 'JQYZJ'"> group by t.BUSISWZ_ORG_ID--(按照区域总监) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JQYJL'"> group by t.BUSIAR_ORG_ID--(按照区域经理) </if> <if test="produceType == 'JFHJL'"> group by t.GROUP_ORG_ID--(按照分行经理) </if> ) l2 on l1.org_id=l2.ORGANIZATION_ID

SELECT * FROM ( select FIN_ORG_NAME_YC as MORT_FIN_BRANCH_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO c WHERE c.MORT_FA_FIN_ORG_CODE = FIN_ORG_CODE AND c.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI = 1 AND (c.MORT_TYPE = '30016001' OR c.MORT_TYPE = '30016002') AND convert(varchar(7),c.TRANSFER_APP_TIME,120) = #choiceMonth# AND c.BELONG_MONTH =#belongMonth#) AS CASE_COUNT, (SELECT isnull(SUM(c.MORT_COM_AMOUNT),0) FROM sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO c WHERE c.MORT_FA_FIN_ORG_CODE = FIN_ORG_CODE AND c.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI = 1 AND (c.MORT_TYPE = '30016001' OR c.MORT_TYPE = '30016002') AND convert(varchar(7),c.TRANSFER_APP_TIME,120) = #choiceMonth# AND c.BELONG_MONTH = #belongMonth#) AS MORT_COM_AMOUNT from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG where fin_org_code in ( select distinct FA_FIN_ORG_CODE from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG where FIN_ORG_CODE in (select FIN_ORG_CODE from sctrans.T_TS_SUP ts where ts.SUP_CAT='0') ) ) t ORDER BY t.CASE_COUNT DESC

SELECT top(20) t.MORT_FIN_BRANCH_NAME, t.FIN_ORG_NAME_YC AS MORT_FIN_SUB_BRANCH_NAME, t.CASE_COUNT, t.MORT_COM_AMOUNT, t.IS_RUWEI_BANK FROM ( select ts.*, (SELECT FIN_ORG_NAME_YC FROM sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG WHERE FIN_ORG_CODE = ts.fa_fin_org_code) AS MORT_FIN_BRANCH_NAME, (SELECT count(*) FROM sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO c WHERE c.MORT_FA_FIN_ORG_CODE = ts.FA_FIN_ORG_CODE AND c.MORT_FIN_ORG_CODE = ts.FIN_ORG_CODE AND c.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI = 1 AND (c.MORT_TYPE = '30016001' OR c.MORT_TYPE = '30016002') AND convert(varchar(7),c.TRANSFER_APP_TIME,120) = #choiceMonth# AND c.BELONG_MONTH = #belongMonth#) AS CASE_COUNT, (SELECT round(isnull(SUM(c.MORT_COM_AMOUNT),0),2) FROM sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO c WHERE c.MORT_FA_FIN_ORG_CODE = ts.FA_FIN_ORG_CODE AND c.MORT_FIN_ORG_CODE = ts.FIN_ORG_CODE AND c.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI = 1 AND (c.MORT_TYPE = '30016001' OR c.MORT_TYPE = '30016002') AND convert(varchar(7),c.TRANSFER_APP_TIME,120) = #choiceMonth# AND c.BELONG_MONTH = #belongMonth#) AS MORT_COM_AMOUNT, (SELECT DISTINCT c.IS_RUWEI_BANK FROM sctrans.T_RPT_HISTORY_CASE_BASE_INFO c WHERE c.MORT_FA_FIN_ORG_CODE = ts.FA_FIN_ORG_CODE AND c.MORT_FIN_ORG_CODE = ts.FIN_ORG_CODE AND c.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI = 1 AND (c.MORT_TYPE = '30016001' OR c.MORT_TYPE = '30016002') AND convert(varchar(7),c.TRANSFER_APP_TIME,120) = #choiceMonth# AND c.BELONG_MONTH = #belongMonth#) AS IS_RUWEI_BANK from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG ts right join sctrans.T_TS_SUP as tt on tt.fin_org_code= ts.fin_org_code and tt.sup_cat='0' ) t WHERE t.MORT_FIN_BRANCH_NAME IS NOT NULL ORDER BY t.MORT_COM_AMOUNT DESC
